headline: KKR nears deal to buy Japanese medical gear maker Topcon, sources say
summary: Private equity firm KKRis nearing a deal to acquire Japanese medical gear makerTopcon, according to people familiar with the matter,marking the latest sign of increased leveraged buyout activityin...

headline: KKR : March 25, 2025 | Contact Information for Inquiries Regarding Compensation for Tendering Securityholders in First Tender Offer for FUJI SOFT
summary: TOKYO, March 25, 2025 - FK Co., Ltd. , an entity owned by investment funds managed by KKR, will provide compensation to the shareholders and share option holders who tendered into the First Tender...
